name: Gamify WP Plugin
tagline: Reward your Users for interacting with your WordPress site.
body:
Gamify WP is a WordPress Plugin that enables you to award points to your users for interacting with your site.  

### Author 
John Regan @johnregan3

### Support 

You can find the answer to most of your questions in our Wiki:

[FAQ](https://github.com/johnregan3/gamify-wp-plugin/wiki/FAQ "FAQ")

[Setup](https://github.com/johnregan3/gamify-wp-plugin/wiki/Gamify-WP-Setup "Setup")

[Troubleshooting](https://github.com/johnregan3/gamify-wp-plugin/wiki/Troubleshooting "Troubleshooting")
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
